alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:06PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Greenville County through 545 PM EDT... At 506 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles north of Greenville Downtown, or near Pleasant Ridge State Park, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Travelers Rest, Slater-Marietta, Tigerville, Pleasant Ridge State Park and Cleveland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
